title: Unable to connect to server
body: I am currently in the middle of a ranked game and was suddenly disconnected. I tried letting it wait for a bit, but when they didn't connect I tried restarting the client and now I'm permanently stuck at the "Failed to connect - unable to connect to the server" error. Nothing has changed at my router's end nor at my connection end - things that were downloading are still downloading... streaming music that was playing is still playing... I can connect to the site and put this post up but I can't get back into my game!! Please help!!
